patthana9.12:1.1: Nasārammaṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naanārammaṇaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana9.12:2.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana9.12:3.1: Nacittaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nanocittaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha pañca.)
patthana9.12:5.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana9.12:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana9.12:9.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana9.12:11.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana9.12:13.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana9.12:14.1: Nocittānuparivattiṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. Nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nocittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana9.12:15.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana9.12:16.1: Naajjhattikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nabāhiraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana9.12:17.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana9.12:19.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana9.12:21.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
